column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I was looking forward trying their 12-hour beef short ribs
column2: the meat was very very tender and was just right but everything else around it was very salty. I also ordered pig candy
column3: Dr. Pepper chicken and whiskey okra and they were all salty! I think the taste (recipe) of the food was good but was overwhelmed by salt
column4: if they cut their salt in half or more
column5: it would be great. The ambiance and staff were great.
